thread.title: German side Eintracht BS delighted over Phil Ofosu-Ayeh's Ghana call up
thread.title_full: German side Eintracht BS delighted over Phil Ofosu-Ayeh's Ghana call up

title: German side Eintracht BS delighted over Phil Ofosu-Ayeh's Ghana call up
text:
Sports News | 9 October 2015 21:10 CET German side Eintracht BS delighted over Phil Ofosu-Ayeh's Ghana call up - www.ghanasoccernet.com Ghana defender Phil Ofosu-Ayeh 
Bundesliga two side Eintracht BS are delighted over the call up of defender Phil Ofosu-Ayeh for Ghana's friendly game against Canada. 
The 24-year-old German born Ghanaian earned a surprise call up for the international friendly against Canada in Washington. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
